title: African American abolitionists in Britain
itunes:title: African American abolitionists in Britain
itunes:subtitle: Hannah-Rose Murray describes how African American abolitionists toured Britain in the 19th century. Historyextra.com/podcast
description:
Historian Hannah-Rose Murray describes how Frederick Douglass and other African American abolitionists toured Britain in the 19th century to campaign against slavery in the United States. Historyextra.com/podcast

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
